SEARCH
Package com.voterapp.service

Class ElectionBooth

java.lang.Object
com.voterapp.service.ElectionBooth
public class ElectionBooth extends Object
The ElectionBooth class provides the core functionality for checking the eligibility of a voter based on their age, locality, and voter ID. It contains methods to validate each of these criteria and a method to check overall eligibility. The eligibility checks include: - Age verification (must be 18 or older) - Locality verification (must be within a predefined set of localities) - Voter ID verification (must be a three-digit number) If any of these conditions are not met, a custom exception is thrown.
Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

    • checkAge

      public boolean checkAge(int age) throws UnderAgeException
      Checks if the age is 18 or older.
      Parameters:
      age - the age of the voter
      Returns:
      true if the age is 18 or older
      Throws:
      UnderAgeException - if the age is less than 18

    • checkLocality

      public boolean checkLocality(String locality) throws LocalityNotFoundException
      Checks if the provided locality is within the allowed localities.
      Parameters:
      locality - the locality of the voter
      Returns:
      true if the locality is valid
      Throws:
      LocalityNotFoundException - if the locality is not found in the allowed list

      Returns:

    • checkEligibility

      public boolean checkEligibility(int age, String locality, int voterId) throws NotEligibleException
      Checks the overall eligibility of a voter based on age, locality, and voter ID.
      Parameters:
      age - the age of the voter
      locality - the locality of the voter
      voterId - the voter ID
      Returns:
      true if all conditions are satisfied
      Throws:
      NotEligibleException - if any condition is not satisfied
